name: Project Evolution 1.0
description:
I recommend you DOWNLOAD the proper version for your operating system to experience the least amount of BUGS! There are certain limitations when playing the WebGL version which makes it a less than ideal experience!

Controls are in the in-game UI!

What is Project Evolution?

It is my dream to make an MMORPG. That is a very unattainable goal as of today due to money/time/commitment constraints. Thus, I am going to start from the ground up and slowly build out core mechanics. After X amount of mechanics have been implemented, I will make a game surrounding those mechanics! 

What is Project Evolution 1.0?

An endless arcade game with RPG elements akin to World of Warcraft! Auto attack your way through hordes of enemies and challenge yourself to reach a new high score!
